question: In Kanazawa City, Japan, what is the name of the museum dedicated to contemporary art, which opened in 2004?
true_answer: 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art, Kanazawa
asked_question_translated: Kako se imenuje muzej sodobne umetnosti v mestu Kanazawa na Japonskem, ki so ga odprli leta 2004?
answer: Muzej sodobne umetnosti v mestu Kanazawa na Japonskem se imenuje 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art, Kanazawa.
answer_translated_eng: The Museum of Contemporary Art in Kanazawa, Japan, is called the 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art, Kanazawa.
